extendedInfo.description: Triple Rebuild is a puzzle game where you need to build a town by matching 3 or more items.Simply drag and drop a seed and it will grow into a big castle.Once you start playing, you won't be able to stop!Triple Rebuild currently contains 8 pack of 20 stages, which will give more difficult by each of it.Each stages have it's own scores, don't get too stressed if you can't get the 3 stars.Keep playing and you will learn how to do it on your own.Currently Special items :- Ruby : can be combined with any items- Wall-B : can be used to destroy any items- The Claw : can be used to take an item and place it in another place- Storage : used for a temporary item storage. Item in the storage can't be combined.- Diamond : can be combined with any items and it will combined into a better one- Nitro : will push every item surround it- Magnet : Pull 1 nearby item from every directionThe maximum building you can get is some of the 7 wonders..The combination is unique fixed and not randomized, although some scenarios will force you to get the sameThey need to be combined from a castle or a fort + diamond==============================================Background music is taken from the great source places, incompetech.com.Sound effect taken from many sources, but mostly created with the great sfx maker at www.bfxr.net==============================================Our Games built with cocos2d-x (www.cocos2d-x.org), the great Framework Engine for many platforms.==============================================To make this app free, we use advertisement which will sit on top of the apps..feel free to tap on it, if it's interesting..And we use appbrain, which will shown when you close the app..
